text: The Life Aquatic with Steve Zissou is a 2004 American comedy-drama movie directed by Wes Anderson. It stars Bill Murray, Cate Blanchett, Willem Dafoe, Michael Gambon, Jeff Goldblum, Anjelica Huston, Owen Wilson, and Seymour Cassel. It was released to mixed reviews on December 25, 2004. Category:2004 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies directed by Wes Anderson
title: The Life Aquatic with Steve Zissou
